post.body: is wonderin where the fuk Bush is? Israel takes down entire apt building of civilians 2 kill the family of 1 man in Gaza.
Having a hard time committing 2 ur goals? Try http://www.stickk.com. Set ur goal, set the stakes, get a ref, invite friends 2 cheer u on
is trying to figure how he managed to get lost in the subway station for the first time in his life.
is waiting for his takeout sushi and looking at 2 lesbians eat raw fish. Talk about irony.
's shrink fell asleep and almost fell outta his chair - while Chi was talkin bout his sex life. Wtf?
hopes that every employee in the Philly Parkin Authority gets an STD...like a cold...or headache...
is so ready for "oh nine" and is so over "oh ate". Great-now he's hungry
's main reason why he will NEVER visit Alaska: http://tinyurl.com/7ds3fu
doesnt understand how some GOPs defend "Barack the Magic Negro" as not racist. Hello? "NEGRO"? Use common sense-not politics 2 defend duhs
thinks this is the saddest but cutest friggin picture he's ever seen - http://tinyurl.com/7cb8n3
26-yr old gets a Wii 4 Christmas. Ends up in jail cause he wanted an electronic plane instead. http://tinyurl.com/929vzr
thinks that the Riverview Movie Theater in Philly should finally bcome what it should b - a shooting target range. http://tinyurl.com/8x8y69
wish that his deaftone neighbor would turn down the volume to Guitar Hero Band Edition to foghorn level so he can sleep!
http://twitpic.com/xjiw - is Dexter's pillow for the night
thinks its time 4a huge change in his life. The repetition is daunting & depressin. He will switch from Aquafina 2 Dasani. Change is good

found a lot of clothes he hasn't seen in awhile durin his cleaning and decided to donate them...to himself.

is indifferent bout the Eagles win. Where were they the whole season?
